keyMoments.title: Chopper Defeated by Ohm
keyMoments.description: Chopper, a member of the Straw Hats, is overwhelmed by Priest Ohm in the Upper Ruins.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the formidable power of Enel's priests and the challenges facing the crew.

keyMoments.title: Zoro Arrives at Upper Ruins
keyMoments.description: Zoro crash-lands at the Upper Ruins, bringing the crew's strongest swordsman to the battleground.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the confrontation between Zoro and Ohm in future episodes.

keyMoments.title: Ohm Defeats Chopper
keyMoments.description: Ohm, one of Enel's four priests, demonstrates the lethality of the Ordeal of Iron by defeating Chopper.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes God's Army's dominance over Upper Yard through their powerful priests.

keyMoments.title: Ohm Guards Giant Jack
keyMoments.description: Ohm blocks Wyper's path to God's Shrine, fulfilling his role as guardian of Enel's domain.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the priests' duty to protect their god and his territory.

keyMoments.title: Wyper Reaches Giant Jack
keyMoments.description: Wyper, the strongest Shandian warrior, arrives at Giant Jack to confront Enel and end 400 years of suffering.
keyMoments.significance: Represents the Shandians' determination to reclaim their ancestral homeland.

keyMoments.title: Aisa Senses Danger with Mantra
keyMoments.description: The young Shandian Aisa uses her innate Mantra ability to warn Nami about Nola's approach.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Shandians' natural abilities and their role in the ongoing conflict.
